sentence: However when I was thirsty at 11 pm on a Saturday the bar on the 39th floor which has amazing views was jammed and the bar in the lobby had just closed leaving the only option to go out in the rain to find somewhere else
At 500 night for a single room with insufficient lighting and no access to the lounge the value for money is terrible
The extra towels I had requested and a robe were not in the room
Rooms are just ok old fashioned and small
Finally no hot water in shower and pipes make horrible vibrating sounds when trying to get hot water
I reserved a club room and was assigned to a corner room on floor 18 Room 1824
Beautiful room had stayed previously at the Westin in SFO and it was a little tired
I tried to access the baseball playoff game on the TV in my room and could not find it
My room faced the inner space of the hotel I could not see the sky could not see outdoors
Told the gentleman that checked me in that I could wait for a room if needed as I arrived at 1030 AM
It was clean with the exception of an unsightly dirty vent in the shower but there were modern accommodations that were limited
Rooms are clean and comfortable as expected but there is no feeling of luxury that could be expected for the same price at other locations
Make sure you make time to go up to the 39th floor for The View a bar with a spectacular view of the city
Access to coffee in room
Well situated hotel only downfall is no room service
Had a King Junior suite on the 19th floor
We booked a family room
We went to The View for drinks
In fact I will go as far to say as the room was HUGE
Room size is ok
Nonetheless it ’s not the hotels fault but wish I had a better room
Pain in the ass to get into hotel once there to get a room easy
You can pour your drinks at a cost by swiping your room key card which is pretty cool
do not forget to check out the View after 4 pm for amazing views of the city
Go to the View on the 39th floor and drink eat and gawk
The view from the 39th floor bar was awesome although it ’s hard to find a seat
The updated rooms are sleek and seem like something out of a W Seem cold in a Mariot Location is great close to union square convention center and multiple restaurants
They also had these wonderful sound machines in the room that I took a picture of and have already ordered one on line
Overall even the dated room are clean and no complains from me
I was definitely in one of the older rooms as it very clearly needed to be updated but it was clean and right next to Mascone West where I had a conference
Had to slog many bags to wrong room back down back up to a correct “ no water ” room
I would not say my stay was perfect I got a room far from the elevators and after being out all day having a extra long walk to my room was a bummer
I asked for a different room which took over 45 minutes both on hold with the front desk and then in person because I was tired of being help on hold
The hotel itself was HUGE and it seemed like it took forever to get to our rooms
There was some work being done in the lobby and we had to take two elevators to get to our room
They said ordering breakfast through room services was not an option
albeit we had a city view but you needed to be on a high floor to oversee the city
The rooms are adequate and well laid out
One note the shower in room suite 187 when you get in it the doors slide open
Then we came back from having drinks and ordered a burger and fries from restaurant in lobby to take up to our room
